pages.text: These materials are less frequently used, but due to their complex nature I decide to include a chapter on making them, to save you the guess-work.

pages.title: Rose Gold Ingot
pages.text: A simple alloy of Copper and Gold.

pages.title: Brasium Ingot
pages.text: An alloy of Copper, Gold and Primsteel.

pages.title: Echochalcum Ingot
pages.text: An alloy used to enhance Diamond Tools and Armor.

pages.title: Netherite Ingot
pages.text: Another alloy used to enhance Diamond Tools and Armor, however Netherite seems to be nonexistent now.

pages.title: Conductive Stone Plate
pages.text: Used for Sensors, Repeaters, Comparitors, and Brewing Stands.

pages.title: Thermal Blaze Core
pages.text: A strange power source made from extra-dimensional resources used for several devices.

pages.title: Rune Etching Quill
pages.text: Used to carve Magic Runes into gear.

pages.title: Grimoire of Runecalling
pages.text: Very few have successfully translated the eldritch Runes. Can you?

pages.title: Grimoire of Runecalling
pages.text: If you happen to, I'd love if you could send one my way. Admittedly, I still haven't successfully translated it.

pages.title: Dragon's Breath
pages.text: Used to create Lingering Potions, it's a lot safer to make it from dead Dragons than to try and find a living one to get it from.
